name: Farm
description: Farm lands are productive and contribute to the money generation of the territory they are placed on.

name: Bank
description: Banks are excellent for the mid-game money generation, giving back its worth of investment relatively quickly.

name: Power Plant
description: A power plant is a win condition. If left unchecked, it generates a ton of money for the territory its placed on, allowing its owning player to afford the most powerful and largest armies.
